title: Limit Definition of the Derivative
text: The limit defintion of a derivative is $$\lim_{h\to0} \frac{f{\left(x+h\right)}-f{\left(x\right)}}{h}$$.

title: Plugging In
text: Plug in $$h=1$$ into the previous equation, approaching the $$h$$ from 0- and 0+.

title: Undefined Limits
text: Limits are undefined when they do not approach a finite value or when both sides do not approach the same value.
